Authors:
Thao Phuong Nguyen, Hoang Nguyen Duc Pham, Akira Suzuki,
Toshimitsu FUKIHARU, Kiminori SHIMIZU
Title:
Coprinopsis neocinerea sp. nov.(Basidiomycota, Agaricales),
an agaric ammonia fungus from Southern of Vietnam
Keywords: Coprinoid, urea, saprobic fungi, Lanatuli, Lam Dong
Abstract:
Coprinopsis neocinerea sp.nov. (Basidiomycota, Agaricales)
collected in the urea treated soil of broadleaf mixed forest from
Vietnam is described as a new ammonia fungus. In morphology, this
species are similar to Coprinopsis cinerea a common species but differs
in spore shapes. Phylogenetic analysis with the nuclear ribosomal
internal transcribed spacer (ITS) data also support this new taxon. This
is the first report of ammonia fungus saprophytic in Vietnam.
